pageContext.claim: “We took swift action to open short-term health plans and association health plans to millions and millions of Americans. Many of these options are already reducing the cost of health insurance premiums by up to 60 percent and, really, more than that.”
pageContext.analysis: We were not able to verify Trump's claim of a 60 percent reduction in premiums. But the new short-term health plans authorized by the administration are less expensive for a reason: they offer skimpier coverage and thus provide less protection.
